Topic: Illustrate plants with and without water and light.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a plant that is healthy and describe it as having water and light.
The student can draw a plant that does not have enough water and describe how it looks different.
The student can draw a plant that does not have enough light and describe how it looks different.
The student can illustrate the difference in plant growth with and without water.
The student can illustrate the difference in plant growth with and without light.
